questions.question: So let me ask you these kind of ridiculous questions of what's the best band of all time?
Are you sacrificing a lot of other possible things you could do with that time?
Have you been able to arrive at any wisdom on this part in your years of life?
What can you say about sort of as a, you know, being a programmer as a kind of athlete?
So how much of the pie do you think could be solved by nuclear energy by fission?
Do you want something that kind of gives you a sense of what's going on?
What's the difference between a neural network, a feed forward neural network and a being?
Should we be thinking about robots or can this be achieved in a purely digital system?
